import "./nav.css" import React, { useContext ,useState} from 'react' import noteContext from '../context/noteContext' let AddNote = (props) => { const context = useContext(noteContext) const{addnote}=context const [note, setNote] = useState({title:"",description:"",tag:""}) const handleclick = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); addnote(note.title,note.description,note.tag) setNote({title:"",description:"",tag:""}) } const onchange = (e)=>{ setNote({...note,[e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } return (

Add a Note

) } export default AddNote
